text: A Year of the Quiet Sun () is a 1984 Polish Italian German World War II romantic drama movie directed by Krzysztof Zanussi and starring Maja Komorowska, Scott Wilson, Ewa Dałkowska, Vadim Glowna, Zbigniew Zapasiewicz, Zofia Rysiówna. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 romantic drama movies Category:1980s war movies Category:Polish romance movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Italian romance movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:German romance movies Category:German drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Krzysztof Zanussi
title: A Year of the Quiet Sun
